paper_abstract: There is currently a great interest in using single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in genetic linkage and association studies because of the abundance of SNPs as well as the availability of high-throughput genotyping technologies. Here, we apply a novel ensemble decision approach to extract the relevant SNPs for alcoholism using sib-pair IBD profiles of pedigrees. The results indicate that ensemble decision tree is a promising algorithm for mining genetic markers for complex genetic diseases.
paper_title: Analysis of sib-pair IBD profiles using ensemble decision tree approach: Application to alcoholism
